document_data.name: Black Bull's Tail
document_data.mainbody: The '''Black Bull's Tail''' was a poor-quality inn and tavern found in the village of [[Uluvin]], in the [[Delimbiyr Vale]].
document_data.Services: While the tavern offered discretion, in the way of private rooms, its libations were limited to watered-down beer and old ''[[Winter Wine]]''.
document_data.History: The Black Bull's Tail was nearly completely destroyed by a group of [[hill giant]]s during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
